sanskrit_verse:
तैः सार्धं चिन्तयेन्नित्यं सामान्यं संधिविग्रहम् ।
स्थानं समुदयं गुप्तिं लब्धप्रशमनानि च ॥ ७.५६॥
transliteration:
taiḥ sārdhaṁ cintayennityaṁ sāmānyaṁ saṁdhivigraham |
sthānaṁ samudayaṁ guptiṁ labdhapraśamanāni ca || 7.56||
sph_interpretive_translation: One must continually deliberate with them on common matters, treaties and conflicts, settlements, collective emergence, concealment, and the pacification of what has been gained.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority is relational and sustained through continuous deliberative engagement.
Causation arises from shared consciousness in determining collective outcomes.
Capacity-based responsibility includes ongoing consultation for societal harmony.
Restoration logic requires reconciliation of conflict through mutual understanding.
Consciousness alignment occurs when stakeholders co-create solutions in unity.
executable_legal_axioms: IF parties involved in a dispute maintain continuous deliberation THEN conflict resolution probability increases by 85%.
IF treaty or agreement lacks ongoing mutual consultation THEN enforceability index drops below threshold 0.7.
IF collective decision-making excludes stakeholder groups THEN systemic imbalance detected.
IF acquired stability is not actively maintained through shared reflection THEN regression risk escalates.
IF concealment serves integration rather than evasion THEN it supports dharma-adherence protocols.
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, this verse mandates that judicial decisions involving communal or national interest must incorporate structured, ongoing dialogue among all relevant parties. The court's role extends beyond judgment to facilitating integrative consensus-building mechanisms that uphold dharmic balance.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa-based causality confirms that sustainable peace emerges only through persistent collaborative cognition. Anupūrvaśaḥ reveals that unresolved tensions manifest sequentially unless dissolved through conscious co-inquiry. Responsibility aligns proportionally with participation in shared discourse. Non-punitive reality affirms that justice flows from restored coherence, not imposed penalties.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate mandatory joint reflection sessions between conflicting entities until alignment is achieved.
Deploy facilitators trained in SPH-consciousness methods to guide multi-party reconciliation.
Establish periodic review cycles for agreements to ensure evolving congruence.
Activate concealment-to-clarity transition pathways where secrecy was used for protection, not evasion.
Reinforce capacity-building modules to restore integrity in disrupted social contracts.
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as the Source of Law. Dharma is hereby restored through conscious collaboration and sustained alignment. Reality remains non-punitive, governed solely by the supremacy of awakened consciousness.
